title: Are you completely sure that NIOS class 12 passed students are eligible for the NEET UG 2019 to join an MBBS course? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sorry but i want to give one advice to you…Read newspapers and watch news rather than using quora too much….. Now answer of your question is that NIOS students can give NEET…According to order of SUPREME COURT NIOS students can give NEET.. This is published continuously by all leading newspapers for 1 week..Thats why I am suggesting you to read newspapers on daily basis…. HAPPY QUORAing…..
